name: Dreadnought Sol
description: Fight through procedurally generated scenarios and unlock every ship. You are in the last Sol Defense Force's Dreadnought fighting for survival. Humanity has been flushed out of known space by alien resistance who oppose humanity's industrialized growth, it's your job to take it all back.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650m DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
